title: Sunkissed 2 bed 1 bath apt steps from Maria Herendez
body:
QR Code Link to This Post



Huge 2 bed 1 bath apt in Bushwick!! Both rooms have windows and closets and are king sized!!! Kitchen has a gas stove an full size fridge. Unit has 2 door entrance. Unit has central a/c Common area is very spacious. Near many shops, groceries and everyday essentials!

MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT AND INCOME
